thread.title: Hezbollah Achieves More Precise Hits on IOF Sites Near Lebanon Border
thread.title_full: Hezbollah Achieves More Precise Hits on IOF Sites Near Lebanon Border

title: Hezbollah Achieves More Precise Hits on IOF Sites Near Lebanon Border
text: In support of the Palestinian people and resistance in Gaza and in light of the Israeli aggression on the various South Lebanon villages, the Islamic Resistance continued on Saturday striking the Zionist occupation sites near the Lebanese borders with occupied Palestine, inflicting losses upon the enemy forces. Hezbollah military media released a series of statements outlining the conducted attacks and their outcomes: First Operation The first statement mentioned that the Islamic Resistance fighters targeted Israeli occupation soldiers while they were moving inside the Bayyad Blida site at 00:50 AM on Saturday, May 1, 2024, with artillery shells inflicting a direct hit. Second Operation Islamic Resistance fighters targeted, at 2:10 p.m. on Saturday, May 1, 2024, the spy equipment at the Al-Raheb site with suitable weaponry, scoring direct hits, as the second statement pointed out. Third Operation The third statement revealed that at 3:30 p.m. on Saturday, May 1, 2024, the fighters of the Islamic Resistance targeted the Al-Radar site in the occupied Lebanese Shebaa Farms with missile weapons, striking it directly. Fourth Operation As per the fourth statement, the valiant fighters of the Islamic Resistance targeted the Metulla site, its garrison, and its spy equipment with appropriate weapons, injuring them directly. Source: Hezbollah Military Media
